column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The service was awesome and our server Joel was exceptional. We had the cold lobster
column2: dry aged ribeye bone in with a side of bone marrow
column5: very delicious truffle mac and cheese and the chocolate cream pie. We were not disappointed in any item we tasted even the sour dough bread with the salted butter yum!!!! I would definitely return the next time I visit Chicago.
